snippet: Fusion will anchor Univision’s new Fusion Media Group, to be distributed on a mix of digital and traditional media.
abstract: Spanish-language broadcaster Univision takes full control of Fusion, joint venture it began with Walt Disney Co in 2013; terms are undisclosed.
lead_paragraph: Fusion will anchor Univision’s new Fusion Media Group, to be distributed on a mix of digital and traditional media.

headline.main: Univision Buys Out Disney’s Stake in Fusion
headline.print_headline: Univision Buys Disney Stake in Their Joint Venture Fusion
